about_the_game:
A fast, crazy boomer shooter where mutant hamster-men kidnap you.. and regret it. Bust out of their creepy underground lab with big guns, smash through their evil plans, and turn every furry freak into bloody chunks on your way to freedom. Turn their underground lab into a blood soaked horror… and these twisted rodents have a lot to answer for.

In Hamster Hunter you can navigate through unique levels earning points and trying to top your own high scores. Earn blood vials from the blood on the Hamsters to purchase new weapons. Battle several unique enemy types as well as bosses. Take on the challenge to speed run the levels with a built in speed run timer to try and get a S on all levels for a special reward. Do you have what it takes?

Basic Features

  • Unique Levels.

  • 4 Unique Weapons all for different playstyles.

  • Several Unique enemy types and boss enemies.

  • Built in speed run timers to get your best score.

  • Score tracking along with a intuitive grading system.

name: Hamster Hunter: Rodent Rampage

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium Gold Series or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Integrated HD Graphics or equivalent
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: i5 Series or equivalent
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 1030 or equivalent

short_description: A fast, crazy boomer shooter where mutant hamster-men kidnap you.. and regret it. Bust out of their creepy underground lab with big guns, smash through their evil plans, and turn every furry freak into bloody chunks on your way to freedom.
supported_languages:
English*, German, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
